conversation.content: I want to find comfortable, stylish, and durable jeans that are suitable for both my casual lifestyle and work requirements. within my expected price range: [29.85, 39.99]

They are priced at $49.99. If you are interested in a potentially purchasable option within your budget range, I also have <Potentially purchasable candidate> available.
